title: Brewed-Tpot-for-NYC-With-Love [LB0.37+]
description: New York City Taxi Trip Duration This notebook goes through a simple process of extracting basic features, building a model and then make predictions. I am using the TPOT package to create a pipeline. TPOT is a Python Automated Machine Learning tool that optimizes machine learning pipelines using genetic programming. I thought it is useful to add this to the list of kernels available in this competition.
